title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.10 - Premature destruction or loss of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.10 - Premature destruction or loss of records

State Regulations

When records are destroyed or lost before the expiration of
the prescribed period of retention, a certified statement listing, as far as
may be determined, the records destroyed and describing the circumstances of
accidental or other premature destruction or loss shall be filed with the
commission within 90 days from the date of discovery of such
destruction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
651.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
